SQL Join Types

This document provides an overview of different SQL join types, including LEFT OUTER JOIN, RIGHT OUTER JOIN, FULL OUTER JOIN, and others. It explains the differences between these joins and how to use them in various scenarios.

Key Concepts:

  • LEFT JOIN
  • RIGHT JOIN
  • FULL OUTER JOIN
  • INNER JOIN
  • EXISTS
  • NOT EXISTS
